dxf2svg.util
Class CustomLayerStyle

java.lang.Object
  dxf2svg.util.CustomLayerStyle
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public final class CustomLayerStyle
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

This class encapsulates the concept of a AutoCAD layer object. It wraps a custom style for a layer. It's used to query spar standard styles that are the same for all Drawings (i.e. all layers called 7 have a stroke of black and a line-weight of 0.007in.)

Features: one can also specify a fill for a layer.

Version:
0.1 March 20, 2003
Author:
Andrew Nisbet

CustomLayerStyle

public CustomLayerStyle(java.lang.String name,
                        int penNum,
                        int fill)
Takes the name of the layer and the pen assignment as a String and an fill value. This is a string and as such valid values are those accepted by SVG like '#EFEFFF' or 'black'.

CustomLayerStyle

public CustomLayerStyle(java.lang.String name,
                        Pen pen,
                        int fill)
Takes the name of the layer and the pen assignment and an fill value. This is a string and as such valid values are those accepted by SVG like '#EFEFFF' or 'black'.

public java.lang.String toString()
